text:

author: Bel
text: Its just sad how people are trying to protest peacefully,  just get tear gassed and being shot rubber bullets without no reason. Now they're getting into people's houses when they wanted them to end protesting by putting a curfew. This shouldnt be normla to do. Be safe#TrappedDC
